suppliers.latest_news_summary: AMCOR continues to be a strategic partner for BAT's new category expansion. Recent capacity investments align with Vuse production ramp-up. Supply chain monitoring shows stable operations. AMCOR maintains quality certifications and on-time delivery metrics above 98%.
